## Pages

### Home
https://example.com
Create physics simulations online free with Physics Molars. Design custom interactive scenes, explore physics concepts hands-on, and save your work instantly.

### Scene Builder
https://example.com/builder
Unleash creativity with our interactive physics simulation tool. Drag, drop, and customize objects to build dynamic physics scenes that bring concepts to life.

### Curriculum
https://example.com/curriculum
Explore structured physics education software for students with ready-made simulations, lesson plans, and interactive activities aligned to learning standards.

### Contact
https://example.com/contact
Have questions about our physics education software for students? Contact Physics Molars for support, partnership inquiries, or to share your simulation ideas.
